header.title: Hi, I'm
header.info: An inventive Frontend Developer enthusiastic about creating unique, user-friendly and sustainable web experiences over time.

about.title: Transforming visual concepts into experiences
about.info: My vision is to be able to create websites with a good criteria, that are adaptable, dynamic, accessible and with my own touch of design to give it my personal brand and without leaving aside the efficiency for a good user experience. I like to be aware of new technologies and experiment on my own with new challenges.

skills.title: Technologies and tools with which I work

projects.title: Some of my most relevant works
projects.project1: Hardware store where you can get all the necessary components to build your computer.
projects.project2: Page to book luxury hotel rooms, offering different options according to your needs.
projects.project3: Modern furniture store for different purposes, ideal to turn your home into what you are looking for.
projects.project4: Beats store to find the best melodies for your songs and catalog your works as a producer.
